meanings.definition: A long, detailed story or account
meanings.sent1: The saga of the old man's adventures was filled with excitement and mystery.
meanings.sent2: The family enjoyed reading the saga of the brave knight and his quest.
meanings.sent3: Grandma always tells the saga of how she met grandpa at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The saga of the lost city captured the imagination of all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The saga of the magical kingdom was passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: A series of events or a story that is exciting or dramatic
meanings.sent1: The saga of the daring rescue kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent2: The town's saga of the great flood was retold every year.
meanings.sent3: The saga of the missing cat turned out to be a hilarious misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: The saga of the star-crossed lovers ended in tragedy.
meanings.sent5: The saga of the haunted house sent shivers down everyone's spines.

meanings.definition: A long, complicated story or series of events
meanings.sent1: The saga of the family feud spanned generations and caused much strife.
meanings.sent2: The political saga of corruption and betrayal shocked the nation.
meanings.sent3: The saga of the never-ending traffic jam became a running joke in the city.
meanings.sent4: The saga of the ancient artifact's discovery unfolded like a thrilling mystery.
meanings.sent5: The saga of the secret society was full of twists and turns.
